Title: Create DFB Load with High Cargo Value
Description: Create a non-tabular load with cargo value between $100001 and $250000
Steps: 1. Login to BTMS;2. Navigate to Loads;3. Create new non-tabular load;4. Enter cargo value as 150000;5. Save and verify load
Expected Results: Load should be created successfully;Cargo value should display as $150,000;Load status should be Active

Title: Verify TNX Post Automation
Description: Test post automation rule with carrier waterfall setup
Steps: 1. Login to BTMS;2. Setup post automation rule;3. Configure carrier waterfall;4. Create load matching rule;5. Post to TNX;6. Verify auto-post to TNX
Expected Results: Post automation should trigger;Load should appear in TNX;Carrier waterfall should execute

Title: Create Load and Verify in DME
Description: Create load and verify it appears in DME dashboard
Steps: 1. Login to BTMS;2. Navigate to Loads;3. Create new non-tabular load;4. Save and verify load;5. Get load number;6. Verify load in DME
Expected Results: Load created successfully;Load appears in DME dashboard;DME status is correct

Title: Post Load to TNX with Offer Rate
Description: Post a load to TNX with specific offer rate
Steps: 1. Login to BTMS;2. Navigate to Loads;3. Create new non-tabular load;4. Enter offer rate as 1800;5. Post to TNX;6. Verify post status
Expected Results: Load posted to TNX;Offer rate displayed correctly;Post status is Posted

Title: Process 204 Load Tender
Description: Verify EDI 204 load tender processing and 990 response
Steps: 1. Login to BTMS;2. Navigate to EDI queue;3. Receive 204 tender via EDI;4. Verify tender appears in queue;5. Accept the tender;6. Verify 990 acknowledgment sent;7. Check load creation
Expected Results: 204 tender should be processed;990 should be sent automatically;Load should be created from tender

Title: Reject 204 Load Tender
Steps: 1. Login to BTMS;2. Navigate to EDI queue;3. Receive 204 tender;4. Reject the tender;5. Verify 990 rejection sent

Title: Verify Commission Calculation
Description: Verify commission is calculated correctly for a load
Steps: 1. Login to BTMS;2. Navigate to Finance;3. Search for commission report;4. Verify commission amount;5. Check internal share calculation
Expected Results: Commission calculated correctly;Internal share is accurate

Title: Create New Sales Lead
Description: Create a new sales lead and verify status
Steps: 1. Login to BTMS;2. Navigate to Customer;3. Click New Sales Lead;4. Enter lead information;5. Save lead;6. Verify lead created
Expected Results: Sales lead created;Lead status is New;Lead appears in queue

Title: Verify Carrier Status
Description: Verify carrier status and profile information
Steps: 1. Login to BTMS;2. Navigate to Carrier;3. Search for carrier;4. Verify carrier status;5. Check carrier profile
Expected Results: Carrier found;Status is Active;Profile information correct

Title: Bulk Update Load Status
Description: Perform bulk status update on multiple loads
Steps: 1. Login to BTMS;2. Navigate to Loads;3. Select multiple loads;4. Click Bulk Change;5. Update status;6. Verify changes applied
